viewData.name: LG SK8070PUA 75" Class HDR UHD Smart Nano Cell IPS LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy LG SK8070PUA 75" Class HDR UHD Smart Nano Cell IPS LED TV featuring UHD 3840 x 2160 Nano Cell IPS LED Panel, HDR10, HLG, Dolby Vision Support Advanced HDR Support via USB. Review LG SK8070
viewData.long_description: Enjoy UHD HDR video with compatible content and the LG SK8070PUA- 75" Class HDR UHD Smart Nano Cell IPS LED TV. The 74.5" LED-backlit LCD panel features a native resolution of 3840 x 2160, allowing you to view UHD images, and the 120 Hz refresh rate with TruMotion 240 technology helps reduce the blur commonly associated with fast-moving, on-screen objects. It can display HLG, HDR10, and Dolby Vision video with compatible source devices and content; it can also play Advanced HDR video via USB. Its four HDMI inputs allow you to connect your digital HD sources, such as HD cable/satellite boxes or game consoles.
